dcterms:creator: D. Shimada
R. Kotani
H. Iyatomi
dcterms:description: The newspaper dataset contains 5,610 Japanese major web newspaper articles (Asahi, Mainichi, Sankei, and Yomiuri) in the categories of politics, the economy, and international news, for a total of 22,440 articles.
dcterms:title: Newspaper

dcterms:creator: D. Aldón Mínguez
M. Ruiz Costa-Jussà
J. Adrián Rodríguez Fonollosa
dcterms:description: The livedoor dataset is commonly used to evaluate models for Japanese and contains a total of 7,367 articles across nine categories, including 870 and 900 Japanese sentences in the categories of movie-enter and sports-watch, respectively.
dcterms:title: Livedoor
